issue.title: [C++] The index_in_meta_binary/is_in_meta_binary kernels are missing a docstring
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14751](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14751). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `index_in_meta_binary` and `is_in_meta_binary` meta kernels don't have a docstring added when registered.

See https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/2b10648c831cb0ff71ab72098c46adf527710efc/cpp/src/arrow/compute/kernels/scalar_set_lookup.cc#L451, the `doc` member is set to nullptr.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14751?focusedCommentId=17446052) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11737
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11737>
